;----BASE CODE SECTION----
;----Level 0 (Ground-Level)----
;----L0 RHW-2 (0x5700)----
;Most instances handled by RUL1, INRUL13 and INRUL14
;DxO and DxD T Fix (TD5)
;DxO
0x57000200,0,0,0x57007000,2,0=0x5760D500,0,0,0x57007000,2,0
0x57000200,3,0,0x57007000,0,1=0x5760D500,2,1,0x57007000,0,1

0x57000200,3,0,0x57004A00,3,1=0x5760D500,2,1,0x57004A00,3,1
0x57000200,0,0,0x57027A00,2,0=0x5760D500,0,0,0x57027A00,2,0
0x57000200,3,0,0x57027A00,0,1=0x5760D500,2,1,0x57027A00,0,1
0x57000200,0,0,0x57027A80,2,0=0x5760D500,0,0,0x57027A80,2,0
0x57000200,3,0,0x57027A80,0,1=0x5760D500,2,1,0x57027A80,0,1

0x57007300,0,0,0x57605309,1,1=0x57605300,1,1,0x57605309,1,1

;----Diagonal RHW-2 x Diag Avenue Fix (T73)----
0x57607309,0,0,0x5700A309,2,0=0x57607309,0,0,0x57607300,3,1
0x57607309,2,1,0x5700A309,1,0=0x57607309,2,1,0x57607300,1,0


;----Avenue/RHW-2 Transition (F4/F5)----
0x5700F480,0,0,0x04007300,2,0=0x5700F480,0,0,0x5700F580,0,0
0x5700F480,2,1,0x04007300,1,0=0x5700F480,2,1,0x5700F580,2,1
;
0x5700F480,1,0,0x04006100,1,0=0x5700F480,1,0,0x5700F400,1,0
0x5700F480,3,1,0x04006100,3,0=0x5700F480,3,1,0x5700F400,3,1
0x5700F580,1,0,0x04006100,3,0=0x5700F580,1,0,0x5700F500,1,0
0x5700F580,3,1,0x04006100,1,0=0x5700F580,3,1,0x5700F500,3,1

;----Roundabout Connections----
;OWR Connection handled by OWR Roundabout Section
;Avenue Roundabouts
;Center (TE3)
0x57601300,3,0,0x5F479100,0,0=0x5760E300,0,0,0x5F479100,0,0
0x57601300,3,0,0x5F479000,0,0=0x5760E300,0,1,0x5F479000,0,0
0x57601300,1,0,0x5F479100,1,0=0x5760E300,2,1,0x5F479100,1,0
0x57601300,1,0,0x5F479000,0,1=0x5760E300,2,0,0x5F479000,2,1
;
0x5760E300,0,1,0x57601300,3,0=0x5760E300,0,1,0x5760E300,0,0
0x5760E300,2,0,0x57601300,1,0=0x5760E300,2,0,0x5760E300,2,1
;Edge (TE4)
0x57603300,0,0,0x5F479000,0,1=0x5760E400,2,0,0x5F479000,0,1
0x57603300,2,1,0x5F479000,2,0=0x5760E400,0,1,0x5F479000,2,0
0x57004300,0,1,0x5F479000,0,1=0x5760E400,2,0,0x5F479000,0,1
0x57004300,2,0,0x5F479000,2,0=0x5760E400,0,1,0x5F479000,2,0
;TE3 next to TE4
0x57601300,1,0,0x5760E400,0,0=0x5760E300,2,1,0x5760E400,0,0
0x57601300,3,0,0x5760E400,2,1=0x5760E300,0,0,0x5760E400,2,1
0x5760E300,2,1,0x57603300,2,0=0x5760E300,2,1,0x5760E400,0,0
0x5760E300,0,0,0x57603300,0,1=0x5760E300,0,0,0x5760E400,2,1
0x5760E300,2,1,0x57004300,2,1=0x5760E300,2,1,0x5760E400,0,0
0x5760E300,0,0,0x57004300,0,0=0x5760E300,0,0,0x5760E400,2,1
;TE4 next to TE3
0x5760E400,1,0,0x57601300,1,0=0x5760E400,1,0,0x5760E300,2,0
0x5760E400,3,1,0x57601300,3,0=0x5760E400,3,1,0x5760E300,0,1
;

0x57004300,0,1,0x57601300,3,0=0x5760E400,2,0,0x5760E300,0,1
;
;Fix under DxD RHWxRHW setups
0x5710AA00,2,0,0x57000500,1,0=0x5710AA00,2,0,0x57000200,1,0
0x5710AA00,0,1,0x57000500,3,1=0x5710AA00,0,1,0x57000200,2,0; conflicting-override
;AUTO-CONNECT KILLERS
;for multi-tile diagonals
0x57004A00,1,0,0x57000400,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x57004A00,3,1,0x57000400,1,1=0,0,0,0,0,0
;----- diagonal intersection smoothing -----
; -> diag rhw-2 into ortho road
0x57605100,0,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x57605100,0,0,0x57000500,3,1
0x57605100,2,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x57605100,2,1,0x57000500,1,0
; -> diag rhw-2 into road 90 v1
0x5760D600,1,1,0x57000200,2,0=0x5760D600,1,1,0x57000500,3,1
; -> diag rhw-2 into road 90 v2
0x5760D680,1,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x5760D680,1,1,0x57000500,1,0
; -> diag rhw-2 into road T
0x5760D700,3,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x5760D700,3,0,0x57000500,3,1
0x5760D700,1,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x5760D700,1,1,0x57000500,1,0

;-------------------------------------------
; diagonal transition from avenue to rhw-2 (compact version)
0x5F47F100,2,0,0x57000200,1,0=0x5F47F100,2,0,0x5700F900,2,0
; mirror
0x5F47F100,0,1,0x57000200,2,0=0x5F47F100,0,1,0x5700F900,0,1

; diagonal transition from avenue to rhw-2 (full version)
  ; shares code with road version
  ; row 1 (stub-to-stub initialize)
  0x57000300,2,0,0x04004200,3,0=0x5700fc00,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
  0x57000300,2,0,0x04004200,0,1=0x5700fc00,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    ; stabilize
    0x5700fc00,0,0,0x04004200,3,0=0x5700fc00,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    0x5700fc00,0,0,0x04004200,0,1=0x5700fc00,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    0x57000300,2,0,0x5F47F500,0,0=0x5700fc00,0,0,0x5F47F500,0,0
    ; mirror - covered by short transition code
  ; row 0 from row 1
  0x5700fc00,1,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x5700fc00,1,0,0x5700fb00,1,0
    ; mirror
    0x5700fc00,3,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x5700fc00,3,1,0x5700fb00,3,1
	
;Cross-Network Diagonal T-Fixes
;Street-side fix for RHW-2 (Thru) x Street (End) OxD T
0x57602000,0,0,0x5f500200,2,0=0x57602000,0,0,0x5f500400,3,1
0x57602000,2,1,0x5f500200,1,0=0x57602000,2,1,0x5f500400,1,0

;Road-side fix for RHW-2 (Thru) x Road (End) OxD T
0x57602100,0,0,0x00000a00,2,0=0x57602100,0,0,0x00000c00,3,1
0x57602100,2,1,0x00000a00,1,0=0x57602100,2,1,0x00000c00,1,0

;One-Way Road-side fix for RHW-2 (Thru) x One-Way Road (End) OxD T
0x57602200,0,0,0x09000a00,2,0=0x57602200,0,0,0x09000c00,3,1
0x57602200,2,1,0x09000a00,1,0=0x57602200,2,1,0x09000c00,1,0
